alert.note: Alert for Pima; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 17 at 6:28PM MST until July 17 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Pima County in southeastern Arizona... Southeastern Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 700 PM MST. * At 627 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near San Manuel, or 12 miles south of Mammoth, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly remote areas of northeastern Pima and southeastern Pinal Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
